Intelligently Automated DDoS Defense

Many business organizations struggle to detect and mitigate Distributed Denial of Service (DDoS) attacks in a timely and efficient manner. The cost of downtime, which for most organizations can run more than $500 per minute, is not the only risk. DDoS is increasingly being used as part of broader

ACG Market Report: NETSCOUT Inline Security

Enterprise adoption of SaaS applications and migration of IT applications to the cloud have been accompanied by a dramatic increase in security threats, which are driving IT managers to deploy a new generation of inline security systems.

Basic page

Christopher Perretta

Christopher Perretta was appointed a director of the Corporation in September 2014. Mr. Perretta has served as chief information and operations officer at MUFG Americas Holdings Corporation and its U.S. banking subsidiary, MUFG Union Bank, N.A. since April 2016.
Leadership/Speakers

Joseph G. Hadzima, Jr.

Joseph G. Hadzima, Jr. has been a director of the Corporation since July 1998. Mr. Hadzima has been a Managing Director of Main Street Partners LLC, a venture capital investing and technology commercialization company, since April 1998.
Leadership/Speakers

John R. Egan

John R. Egan has been a director of the Corporation since October 2000. Mr. Egan is a founding managing partner of Egan-Managed Capital, a Boston-based venture capital fund specializing in New England.
Leadership/Speakers

Robert E. Donahue

Robert E. Donahue has been a NETSCOUT director since March 2013. He served on the board of directors of Sycamore Networks, Inc., an intelligent optical networking and multiservice access provider, from July 2007 until October 2014.
Leadership/Speakers

Ashwani Singhal

Ashwani Singhal is Senior Vice President of Research & Development. Mr. Singhal joined NETSCOUT in 1987 and served as a Senior Software Engineer and Project Manager from 1987 until February 1997, as Director of Engineering from February 1997 until October 1998.
Leadership/Speakers
